Text: Re NAESB Board Vote on Quadrant Procedures Cc I am concerned that the Parliamentary Committee as chosen by Boswell will be ruling on the pipeline issue about the makeup of that Parliamentary Committee so will it get an unbiased review I hope so but I think we need to convince Boswell to have a pipeline on the Parliamentary Committee particularly since the pipelines are the ones who have been the most active group and therefore have the most knowledge and experience of how things should work Dale

Order RM Partial Day Recalls BPS Schedule is Official Pipeline Segment Meeting Cc Following is info on BPS Pipeline Segment and EC meetings in April May FYI On the Triage call this afternoon Kim announced the following BPS schedule for dealing with the recall order Wed conference call central agenda only to identify the issues and not to work on any of the issues at this point WedThurs face to face Con Ed in NYC Wed conference call central TuesWed face to face in Houston probably CMS Kim indicated that on the call wed know better what additional meetings might be needed I suggested that since the Technical and IR are meetings are in Houston Mon May Tech and TuesWed May IR that if there needs to be another face to face about that time that we could possibly have it that Thursday and Friday May in Houston Stay tuned on any dates after the May meeting Kim is going to try to have the NAESB office post this schedule this afternoon Kim also asked me to remind everyone about the Pipeline Segment meeting to prepare for the BPS meetings see her email of Date Time am pm central Location CMS Panhandle Eastern Pipe Line Westheimer Houston Please check in with the th floor receptionist Conference calling will be available If you have not done so already please send Kim an email letting her know if you will attend in person or via conference call Last but not least April EC meeting the NAESB web page shows it as being a day meeting Thursday and Friday I confirmed with Jim Buccigross this morning that it will only be a one day meeting on Thursday in DC Have a great weekend and keep those travel departments busy Just think about all the wonderful places you can go as your frequent flyer accounts build up this year Dale Davis Williams Gas Pipeline office cell
